title: Inception
description: A skilled thief leads a team into people's dreams.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation.

title: Interstellar
description: Astronauts search for a new home for humanity.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two hitmen intertwine with crime stories in LA.

title: Fight Club
description: An office worker forms an underground fight club.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man's extraordinary life.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker is wrongly imprisoned and plans his escape.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer trains under a ruthless instructor.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a rich household.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians compete for supremacy.

title: Shutter Island
description: A US Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the rise of Facebook.

title: La La Land
description: A musician and an actress fall in love in Los Angeles.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee consults a serial killer to catch another.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer using the seven deadly sins.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge teams up with a lobby boy to prove his innocence.
